==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Dunia:''' Genius Invokation TCG and mechanical paintings... Do these two have anything in common at all?
:{{DIcon|TCG}} About [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!/Zero Hour Invokation|Zero Hour Invokation]]...
::'''Dunia:''' Oh? You're interested in Zero Hour Invokation?
::'''Dunia:''' No problem, please build your deck here. If you have any other questions, just ask me anytime.
::'''Dunia:''' We have a player called "Revived Serval" currently waiting for an opponent.
::'''Dunia:''' You may begin once you're ready.
::{{A|vo card collei event invite start 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' Whoa... There are so many players crowded around... Uhh, I'm getting kinda nervous...
::{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
::;(Open [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!/Zero Hour Invokation|Zero Hour Invokation]] interface)
::;(Win the match)
::::{{A|vo card collei event invite fail 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' I&mdash;I've never been in a situation like that before...
::;(Lose the match)
::::{{A|vo card collei event invite win 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' I finally won! Looks like my trip here wasn't in vain after all.
::{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
:::{{A|vo card collei event invite leave 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' You're leaving? Uh, me? I'm gonna meet up with Master. Where were we supposed to meet again...
:{{DIcon}} About the mechanical paintings...
::'''Dunia:''' The mechanisms crafted by that Fontaine man? I placed them over there.
::'''Dunia:''' Me? I'm not interested in mechanisms and the like, so I haven't taken a closer look at them.
::'''Dunia:''' If you're interested, though, feel free to check them out.
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::'''Dunia:''' Sure, you go ahead. I'll be here throughout the King of Invokations Grand Prix.
::'''Dunia:''' If you ever feel like playing Zero Hour Invokation, just come find me here. I'll get everything prepared.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
* The name "''Dunia''" is derived from an Arabic word and translates to "World".
